snippet: A writer in The Journal of Commerce profess to have discovered the total sum of benefit arrived from Father Matthew's visit to America, and values it at 25 cents per capitum assessed upon the signers of his pledge....
lead_paragraph: A writer in The Journal of Commerce profess to have discovered the total sum of benefit arrived from Father Matthew's visit to America, and values it at 25 cents per capitum assessed upon the signers of his pledge.
